      • isRequiredByFollowingUnits

        private boolean isRequiredByFollowingUnits(Unit from,
                                 Unit to)
        Checks if the units occurring between [from, to] consume . stack items not produced by these interval units. (ie if the stack height ever goes negative between from and to, assuming the stack height is set to 0 upon executing the instruction following 'from'.

      • canMoveUnitOver

        private boolean canMoveUnitOver(Unit aUnitToMove,
                      Unit aUnitToGoOver)
        When reordering bytecode, check if it is safe to move aUnitToMove past aUnitToGoOver.
        Returns:
        true if aUnitToMove can be moved past aUnitToGoOver.

      • replaceUnit

        private void replaceUnit(Unit aToReplace1,
               Unit aToReplace2,
               Unit aReplacement)
        Replace 1 or 2 units by a third unit in a block. Both units to replace should be in the same block. The map 'mUnitToBlockMap' is updated. The replacement unit is inserted in the position, of the aToReplace2 if not null, otherwise in aToReplace1's slot.
        Parameters:
        aToReplace1 - Unit to replace. (shouldn't be null)
        aToReplace2 - Second Unit to replace (can be null)
        aReplacement - Unit that replaces the 2 previous units (shouldn't be null)

      • replaceUnit

        private void replaceUnit(Unit aToReplace,
               Unit aReplacement)

      • isExceptionHandlerBlock

        private boolean isExceptionHandlerBlock(Block aBlock)

      • getDeltaStackHeightFromTo

        private int getDeltaStackHeightFromTo(Unit aFrom,
                            Unit aTo)

      • doInterBlockOptimizations

        private void doInterBlockOptimizations()
        Performs 2 simple inter-block optimizations in order to keep some variables on the stack between blocks. Both are intended to catch 'if' like constructs where the control flow branches temporarily into two paths that join up at a latter point.

      • allSuccesorsOfAreThePredecessorsOf

        private boolean allSuccesorsOfAreThePredecessorsOf(Block aFirstBlock,
                                         Block aSecondBlock)
        Given 2 blocks, assertions whether all the successors of the first block are the predecessors of the second block.

        Returns:
        true if aUnit is a commutative binary operator
